cont.entity_a: Three out of four headphones broke apart and the covering on the last one flaked off.
The band is smaller, plastic is delicate.
cont.entity_b: Difficult to place headphones on the base for charging.

cont.entity_a: Sound quality is excellent for the price. Sound quality is good but not loud enough on some devices. Excellent sound quality, especially for music and movies.
cont.entity_b: Sound quality is not the greatest but works well with no obstructions. Sound quality is better than TV speakers. Optical input provides clean sound.

cont.entity_a: The bass is not as deep, but high and mid-range are clearer than Beats.
The cable is excessively long, making it inconvenient for gym use. Cord is very long, which can be inconvenient.
Comfortable for long-term use. Uncomfortable fit for users with glasses. Fit is snug and comfortable, but not suitable for larger heads.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable fit that makes them easy to forget while wearing.

cont.entity_a: Not suitable for audio editing, but good for general use. Great for blocking out background noise.
cont.entity_b: Good for watching TV without disturbing others. Surround effect works for movies.

cont.entity_a: Some units have issues with the left headphone not working.
cont.entity_b: Background hiss present due to interference. Some interference with plasma TVs. No interference when positioned correctly.

cont.entity_a: Wires are suspect and look prone to damage under normal conditions.

cont.entity_b: Battery life is excellent. Long battery life but less than expected.
Short range from the base. Not suitable for moving around due to signal loss.
Volume control is difficult to use.
